panels.title: Litmus Chaos Chaos durations interleaved with Node Exporter & Kube-State Metrics

targets.expr: (kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores{kublr_space="$space",kublr_cluster="$cluster"}-kube_node_status_allocatable_cpu_cores{kublr_space="$space",kublr_cluster="$cluster"})/kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores{kublr_space="$space",kublr_cluster="$cluster"}
